anyOf.description: A StringCheckGrader object that performs a string comparison between input and reference using a specified operation.

input.description: The input text. This may include template strings.

operation.description: The string check operation to perform. One of `eq`, `ne`, `like`, or `ilike`.

reference.description: The reference text. This may include template strings.

type.description: The object type, which is always `string_check`.

anyOf.title: StringCheckGrader

anyOf.description: A TextSimilarityGrader object which grades text based on similarity metrics.

evaluation_metric.description:
The evaluation metric to use. One of `cosine`, `fuzzy_match`, `bleu`, 
`gleu`, `meteor`, `rouge_1`, `rouge_2`, `rouge_3`, `rouge_4`, `rouge_5`, 
or `rouge_l`.

type.description: The type of grader.

anyOf.title: TextSimilarityGrader

anyOf.description: A PythonGrader object that runs a python script on the input.

image_tag.description: The image tag to use for the python script.

source.description: The source code of the python script.

type.description: The object type, which is always `python`.

anyOf.title: PythonGrader

anyOf.description: A ScoreModelGrader object that uses a model to assign a score to the input.

input.description: The input text. This may include template strings.

items.description:
A message input to the model with a role indicating instruction following
hierarchy. Instructions given with the `developer` or `system` role take
precedence over instructions given with the `user` role. Messages with the
`assistant` role are presumed to have been generated by the model in previous
interactions.

anyOf.description: A text input to the model.
anyOf.title: Text input

anyOf.description: A text input to the model.

text.description: The text input to the model.

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_text`.

anyOf.title: Input text

anyOf.description: A text output from the model.

text.description: The text output from the model.

type.description: The type of the output text. Always `output_text`.

anyOf.title: Output text

anyOf.description: An image input to the model.

detail.description: The detail level of the image to be sent to the model. One of `high`, `low`, or `auto`. Defaults to `auto`.

image_url.description: The URL of the image input.

type.description: The type of the image input. Always `input_image`.

anyOf.title: Input image

anyOf.description: An audio input to the model.

format.description:
The format of the audio data. Currently supported formats are `mp3` and
`wav`.

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_audio`.

anyOf.title: Input audio

anyOf.description: A list of inputs, each of which may be either an input text, input image, or input audio object.
anyOf.title: An array of Input text, Input image, and Input audio

content.description: Inputs to the model - can contain template strings.

role.description:
The role of the message input. One of `user`, `assistant`, `system`, or
`developer`.

type.description: The type of the message input. Always `message`.

items.title: Eval message object

model.description: The model to use for the evaluation.

range.description: The range of the score. Defaults to `[0, 1]`.

sampling_params.description: The sampling parameters for the model.

type.description: The object type, which is always `score_model`.

anyOf.title: ScoreModelGrader

anyOf.description: A MultiGrader object combines the output of multiple graders to produce a single score.

calculate_output.description: A formula to calculate the output based on grader results.

items.title: Eval message object

labels.description: The labels to assign to each item in the evaluation.

model.description: The model to use for the evaluation. Must support structured outputs.

passing_labels.description: The labels that indicate a passing result. Must be a subset of labels.

type.description: The object type, which is always `label_model`.

type.description: The object type, which is always `multi`.
